## Erc20Mintable class

Mint ERC20 Tokens

## Example

```javascript
const contract = await sdk.getContract("{{contract_address}}");
await contract.nft.mint.to(walletAddress, nftMetadata);
```

| Method                                      | Modifiers | Description |

## Remarks

Token minting functionality that handles unit parsing for you.
